#include <stdio.h>
int main() {
	int n, c1 = 1, c2 = 1, i;
	scanf("%d", &n); 
	char s[n];
	scanf("%s", s);
	float a, f;
	scanf("%f %f", &a, &f);
	for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		if(s[i] == s[i + 1]) {
			c1 = 0;
			break;
		}
	}
	if(a >= f)
		c2 = 0;
	if(c1 == 1 && c2 == 1)
		printf("YES\n");
	else
		printf("NO\n");
	return 0;
}
